|ftname=National Trust properties in Somerset |currentstatus=GA |topic= Geography }} {{WikiProject Somerset|class=GA|importance=low}} {{WPMILHIST|class=GA|B1=y|B2=y|B3=y|B4=y|B5=y|British=yes|Fortifications=y}} There was a misplaced exchange here that I have moved to the [[Talk:Solsbury_Hill_(song)|discussion page]] for the article about the [[Solsbury_Hill_(song)|song titled Solsbury Hill]]. [[User:Doonhamer|Doonhamer]] 01:55, 18 January 2007 (UTC)
== references/citations ==
I don't know how to put citation in the page because the references for the info on the page is in images that i put on here so it is hard to show that. <small>—Preceding [[Wikipedia:Signatures|unsigned]] comment added by [[Special:Contributions/86.157.251.230|86.157.251.230]] ([[User talk:86.157.251.230|talk]]) 11:21, 20 May 2008 (UTC)</small><!-- Template:UnsignedIP --> <!--Autosigned by SineBot-->
== Salisbury and Solsbury can be difficult to distinguish in speech. ==
Aren't they pronounced identically? [[User:Rp|Rp]] ([[User talk:Rp|talk]]) 13:17, 23 September 2011 (UTC)
Not by me or those with my accent - Souls bree and Sorlz bree. It is a small sound difference though and when I first heard the song by Peter Gabriel, I did think that it was about Salisbury Hill. [[Special:Contributions/81.106.3.196|81.106.3.196]] ([[User talk:81.106.3.196|talk]]) 20:16, 13 October 2013 (UTC)
== What else is needed to get this article to GA quality? ==
What else do people think is needed to get this article to meet the [[Wikipedia:Good article criteria|Good article criteria]]?— [[User:Rodw|Rod]] <sup>[[User talk:Rodw|talk]]</sup> 17:28, 15 March 2014 (UTC) :Has the hill ever been excavated by archaeologists? Add more details on the road protests. And watch the formatting on your references, make sure that titles are in title case and that everything is consistent.--[[User:Sturmvogel 66|Sturmvogel 66]] ([[User talk:Sturmvogel 66|talk]]) 00:49, 27 April 2014 (UTC) ::Thanks. The excavations of the 1950s are included (see Dowden refs) + more recent geophysics (Oswin). I will look for more on the turf maze by road protesters. I have attempted to standardise the capitalisation of reference titles. — [[User:Rodw|Rod]] <sup>[[User talk:Rodw|talk]]</sup> 07:46, 27 April 2014 (UTC) * If we're mentioning Peter Gabriel, we should also mention that he lived nearby until recently. Wasn't David Dimbleby also a neighbour, and spoke as part of the road protests? [[User:Andy Dingley|Andy Dingley]] ([[User talk:Andy Dingley|talk]]) 18:59, 12 June 2014 (UTC) :*I believe [[Peter Gabriel]] lived in the Wooley Valley which is worth a mention on the [[Charlcombe]] article but is a couple of km west of the hill & nearer to [[Bath, Somerset]]. I'm not sure about [[David Dimbleby]] but believe his brother [[Jonathan Dimbleby]] lived fairly nearby with [[Bel Mooney]]. It is a nice area with lots of "celebrities" houses within a few miles. The protests are mentioned at [[Road protest in the United Kingdom#1979–1997]] do you think more is needed here?— [[User:Rodw|Rod]] <sup>[[User talk:Rodw|talk]]</sup> 19:16, 12 June 2014 (UTC)
: Maybe it would be helpful to get a picture of Solsbury Hill. The current picture shows a view from the top of the hill, which hardly iconic. [[User:Kortoso|Kortoso]] ([[User talk:Kortoso|talk]]) 16:45, 30 July 2014 (UTC)
